body.description: Employment of software Engineers is projected to grow 21 percent from 2018 to 2028, 3 times faster than the average for all job occupations out there. As for the US Bureau of Labor Statistics, one of the main reasons for the rapid growth is due to ‘a large increase in the demand for computer software’.

body.description:
Employment of software Engineers is projected to grow 21 percent from 2018 to 2028, 3 times faster than the average for all job occupations out there. As for the US Bureau of Labor Statistics, one of the main reasons for the rapid growth is due to ‘a large increase in the demand for computer software’.
